utility_tools module¶

utility_tools.arrangeData(input_dir, output_root, target='.shp', train_ratio=0.7, val_ratio=0.2, test_ratio=0.1, overwrite=False)¶
Convenience function to divide up all files in an input directory and

save them into training, validation, or testing directories.

Parameters

  • input_dir (str) – Filepath to directory with data to split.

  • output_root (str) – Filepath to directory where split data will be stored.

  • target (str) – File ending to search for IDs with, defaults to ‘.shp’

  • train_ratio (float) – Proportion of training data, defaults to 0.7

  • val_ratio (float) – Proportion of validation data, defaults to 0.2

  • test_ratio (float) – Proportion of test data, defaults to 0.1

  • overwrite (bool) – Flag to overwrite existing outputs, defaults to False.

Returns

Returns 3 lists: training data, validation data, and testing data

Return type

list, list, list

utility_tools.extractTLSID(input_str)¶

Convenience function to extract TLS ID.

Parameters

input_str (str) – String containing TLS ID.

Returns

Returns the extracted TLS ID.

Return type

str

utility_tools.matchTLS(input_file, target_dir, target='.tif')¶

This is a convenience function to match two files linked by TLS ID.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – Filename with the TLS ID to be matched.

  • target_dir – Filepath to the directory to look for matches.

  • target (str) – The file ending for valid inputs, defaults to ‘.tif’

Type

target_dir: str

Returns

Returns the full filepath to the matching file, or ‘no match found.’

Return type

str

utility_tools.trainValTest(input_list, train_ratio=0.7, val_ratio=0.2, test_ratio=0.1)¶

Convenience function for train, validation, and test split.

Parameters

  • input_list (list) – List of data to split.

  • train_ratio (float) – Proportion of training data, defaults to 0.7

  • val_ratio (float) – Proportion of validation data, defaults to 0.2

  • test_ratio (float) – Proportion of test data, defaults to 0.1

Returns

Returns 3 lists: training data, validation data, and testing data

Return type

list, list, list
